TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Axis extends System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartNamedElement

summary.span: 提供管理 控件中的轴的方法和属性。

span.span: Provides methods and properties that manage axes in the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类封装了轴中的所有功能控制，并通过公开， ，和属性对象。This class encapsulates all the functionality for axes in the control, and is exposed by the , , and properties of objects. 为所有图表 — 除栏、 堆积的条形图、 饼图和圆环图-主要和辅助轴如下所示：For all charts—except bar, stacked bar, pie and doughnut—the primary and secondary axes are as follows: |轴类型Axis Type|描述Description| |---------------|-----------------| |主 x 轴Primary X-Axis|底部水平轴。Bottom horizontal axis.| |辅助 x 轴Secondary X-Axis|顶部的水平轴。Top horizontal axis.| |主 y 轴Primary Y-Axis|左侧的垂直轴。Left vertical axis.| |辅助 y 轴Secondary Y-Axis|右垂直轴。Right vertical axis.| 条形图和堆积条形图有其轴旋转 90 度沿顺时针方向，因此对于这两种图表 X 轴主是左侧的垂直轴。Bar and stacked-bar charts have their axes rotated 90 degrees clockwise, so the primary X axis for these two chart types is the left-vertical axis. **请注意**可以有只有一组轴-两个垂直和两个水平-每个对象。**Note** There can be only one set of axes—two vertical and two horizontal—for each object. 类还包含几种方法可用来将轴值转换为绝对像素坐标，可用于 2D 自定义绘图，或相对坐标，可用于三维自定义绘制。The class also contains several methods that can be used to convert axis values to absolute pixel coordinates, which are useful for 2D custom drawing, or to relative coordinates, which are useful for 3D custom drawing. 此外可将绝对和相对坐标转换轴值。Absolute and relative coordinates can also be converted to axis values. 以下是公开的最重要的轴元素类：The following are the most important axis elements exposed by the class: |轴元素Axis Element|描述Description| |------------------|-----------------| |轴标签Axis Labels|轴，及其关联的属性的标签。The labels of an axis, and their associated properties.| |网格线Grid Lines|轴的主要和次要网格线。The major and minor grid lines of an axis.| |刻度线Tick Marks|轴主要和次要刻度线。The major and minor tick marks of an axis.| |条带线Strip Lines|条带线。Strip lines.|

The axis name.

span.span: Gets or sets the arrow style of a 2D axis; this style is not applied to 3D chart areas.

value.span: 一个 枚举值。

span.span: An enumeration value.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual double Crossing { get; set; }
Public Overridable Property Crossing As Double
public: virtual property double Crossing { double get(); void set(double value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置某个轴与其关联轴相交叉的位置。

span.span: Gets or sets the location at which an axis is crossed by its associated axis.

value.span: 一个 值，该值表示某个轴与其关联轴相交叉的位置。

span.span: A value that represents where an axis is crossed by its associated axis.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置此属性对于主轴将确定其中其他主轴的位置，并同样将其设置为辅助轴将确定其他辅助轴的相交。Setting this property for a primary axis will determine where the other primary axis crosses it, and similarly setting it for a secondary axis will determine where the other secondary axis crosses it. 例如，设置主 x 轴的属性确定主 y 轴将跨越它。For example, setting the property of the primary X-axis determines where the primary Y-axis will cross it. 四种模式可以用于的轴的属性：Four modes can be used for the property of an axis: - "自动"，这意味着，交叉值会设置为相关的轴的最小值或最大值。"Auto", which means that the crossing value will be set to the minimum or maximum value for the relevant axis. 如果轴是辅助如果轴是主，值将为其最小值，它将其最大值。If the axis is primary, the value will be its minimum value, if the axis is secondary it will its maximum value. 若要在运行时设置为"Auto"，使用值。To set to "Auto" at run time, use a value. - "最小值"，这意味着轴的交叉点值将其最小值。"Minimum", which means the crossing value of the axis will be its minimum value. 若要在运行时使用设置为"最小值"值。To set to "Minimum" at run-time use a value. - "最大值"，这意味着轴的交叉点值将其最大值。"Maximum", which means the crossing value of the axis will be its maximum value. 若要设置为"最大值"在运行时使用值。To set to "Maximum" at run-time use a value. - 指定`double`相关轴的最小和最大值之间的值。A specified `double` value that is between the minimum and maximum values for the relevant axis. 如果交叉值是小于最小值或交叉值大于最大值，则将引发异常。If the crossing value is less then minimum value, or the crossing value is greater than maximum value, an exception will be thrown. 当使用非默认交叉值时，标签和轴的刻度线可能或可能不遵循交叉轴显示，具体取决于属性设置。When a non-default crossing value is used, the labels and tick marks of the axis may or may not follow the crossing axis, depending on the property setting. 默认情况下它们将移动交叉轴。By default they will move with the crossing axis.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property CustomLabels As CustomLabelsCollection

Attribute.AttributeName: System.ComponentModel.Editor("System.Windows.Forms.Design.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartCollectionEditor, System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Design, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=31bf3856ad364e35", "System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor, System.Drawing, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a")

summary.span: 获取用于存储 对象的 对象。

span.span: Gets a object used to store objects.

value.span: 对象。

span.span: A object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此属性添加或删除自定义轴标签。Use this property to add or remove custom labels for an axis. 使用对象使得开发人员可以随意设置轴标签的文本。Using objects enables the developer to arbitrarily set the text for axis labels. 仅自定义标签可在第二行的标签。Only custom labels can be used in the second row of labels. 此外，如果第一个标签行中使用自定义标签，则在此第一行中的所有标签必须都是自定义标签。Also, if a custom label is used in the first label row, then all labels in this first row must be custom labels. 此外可从数据点，设置或自动生成从轴刻度标签。Labels can also be set from the data points, or generated automatically from the axis scale.

span.span: Releases unmanaged and, optionally, managed resources.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::AxisEnabled Enabled { System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::AxisEnabled get(); void set(System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::AxisEnabled value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个指示是否启用轴的值。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether an axis is enabled.

value.span: 一个 枚举值。

span.span: An enumeration value.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果未启用轴，轴，以及其属性 （刻度线、 条带线、 标签和等），将不会显示。If an axis is not enabled, the axis, along with its attributes (tick marks, strip lines, labels, and so forth), will not be displayed. 如果启用了轴，轴，以及其所有属性 （刻度线、 条带线、 标签和等），将显示不管是否使用它来绘制。If an axis is enabled, the axis, along with all its attributes (tick marks, strip lines, labels, and so forth), will be displayed regardless of whether or not it is being used to plot a . 如果值为是使用轴可能或可能不显示，具体取决于是否使用它来绘制。If a value of is used, an axis may or may not be displayed, depending on whether it is being used to plot a . 用于绘制数据的轴由和属性设置。The axes that are used to plot data are determined by the and property settings. > [!NOTE] > 如果未启用轴但相邻轴使用网格线，将替代未启用轴显示这些网格行之一。If an axis is not enabled but an adjacent axis is using grid lines, one of those grid lines will be displayed in place of the axis that is not enabled. 如果，则会发生同样的情况下的轴的属性设置为，但轴不用于绘制数据; 将改为绘制相邻轴的网格行。The same situation will occur if the property of an axis is set to , but the axis is not being used to plot data; the grid line of an adjacent axis will be drawn instead.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance float64 GetPosition(float64 axisValue) cil managed
Public Function GetPosition (axisValue As Double) As Double

span.span: The axis value.

summary.span: 将轴值转换为相对位置 (0-100%)。

span.span: Converts an axis value to a relative position (0-100%).

summary.span: 如果是对数轴，则将值转换为线性刻度。

span.span: If an axis is logarithmic, the value is converted to a linear scale.

returns.span: 一个 值，该值表示相对位置 (0-100%)。

span.span: A value that represents the relative position (0-100%).

summary.span: 获取或设置交错带状线的颜色。

span.span: Gets or sets the color of interlaced strip lines.

value.span: 一个 对象，该对象表示交错带状线的颜色。

span.span: A object that represents the color of interlaced strip lines.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性用于指定在调用时显示的交错条带线的颜色属性。Use this property to specify the color of interlaced strip lines that are displayed when you invoke the property. 若要指定交错条带线的边框颜色，您必须显示使用条带集合属性，而不是属性。To specify the border color of the interlaced strip lines, you must display the strips using the collection property instead of the property.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property double Interval { double get(); void set(double value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置轴的间隔。

span.span: Gets or sets the interval of an axis.

value.span: 一个 值，该值表示轴的间隔。

span.span: A value that represents the interval of an axis.

value.span: 默认值为“Auto”，由值零 (0) 表示。

span.span: The default value is "Auto", which is represented by a value of zero (0).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性确定何种频率标记的标签和主要刻度线和网格线与轴绘制如果`Interval`标签、 刻度线或网格线的属性值设置为，它表示未设置。This property determines how often the labels and major tick marks and grid lines associated with the axis are drawn if the `Interval` property value of a label, tick mark, or grid line is set to , which signifies that it is not set. `Interval`主要刻度线、 网格线或轴的标签的属性的优先级高于属性设置的对象。The `Interval` property of a major tick mark, grid line or label of the axis has priority over the property setting of the object. 值为 0 表示"Auto"值。A value of zero represents an "Auto" value. 这属性不能设置为。This property cannot be set to . 如果将此属性的值赋，将改为使用值为零。If you assign this property a value of , a value of zero will be used instead. **请注意**次要网格线和轴的刻度线永远不会使用此属性其时间间隔。**Note** The minor grid lines and tick marks of an axis never use this property for their interval. 轴间隔类型由属性。The interval type of the axis is determined by the property.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::IntervalAutoMode IntervalAutoMode { System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::IntervalAutoMode get(); void set(System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::IntervalAutoMode value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个标志，该标志确定是在轴上使用固定数目的间隔，还是根据轴的大小确定间隔数。

span.span: Gets or sets a flag that determines if a fixed number of intervals is used on the axis, or if the number of intervals depends on the axis size.

value.span: 一个 枚举值。

span.span: An enumeration value.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当属性设置为"自动"属性确定是否应计算多少间隔。When the property is set to "Auto", the property determines how many intervals should be calculated. 如果你的图表进行大小调整或通常重绘，则可以设置属性，在这种情况下图表将动态计算轴间隔。If your chart is resized or redrawn often, you can set the property to , in which case the chart will dynamically calculate axis intervals. 这是在其中显示图表间隔有所不同，具体取决于其数据的情况下特别有用。This is especially useful in situations where the chart intervals are displayed differently, depending on their data.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property double IntervalOffset { double get(); void set(double value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置轴的间隔偏移量。

span.span: Gets or sets the interval offset of an axis.

value.span: 一个 值，该值表示轴的间隔偏移量。

span.span: A value that represents the interval offset of an axis.

value.span: 默认值为“Auto”，由值零 (0) 表示。

span.span: The default value is "Auto", which is represented by a value of zero (0).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性确定轴的间隔偏移量。The property determines the interval offset of an axis. 此值用作轴标签的主要刻度线和网格线如果轴相关联的间隔偏移量`IntervalOffset`未设置的标签、 刻度线或网格线的属性值，这由值为。This value is used as the interval offset of an axis' labels and the major tick marks and grid lines associated with the axis if the `IntervalOffset` property value of the labels, tick marks, or grid lines is not set, which is represented by a value of . 的刻度线、 标签和轴的网格线属性的优先级高于属性设置的对象。The property of the tick marks, labels and grid lines of an axis has priority over the property setting of the object. 值为 0 表示"Auto"值。A value of zero represents an "Auto" value. 此外，不能设置为未设置 (即， )。Also, cannot be set to not set (that is, a ). 如果你将分配，值为"自动"— 也就是说，值为零-将改为使用。If you assign , a value of "Auto"—that is, a value of zero—will be used instead. **请注意**次要网格线和轴的刻度线永远不会将此属性用于其间隔偏移量。**Note** The minor grid lines and tick marks of an axis never use this property for their interval offset. 轴的间隔偏移量的类型由属性。The interval offset type of the axis is determined by the property.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::DateTimeIntervalType IntervalOffsetType { System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::DateTimeIntervalType get(); void set(System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::DateTimeIntervalType value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置轴的间隔偏移量类型。

span.span: Gets or sets the interval offset type of an axis.

value.span: 轴的间隔偏移量类型。

span.span: The interval offset type of an axis.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性确定轴的间隔偏移量的类型，如果针对的轴的标签，主要刻度线和网格线的间隔偏移量类型使用轴元素自身的`IntervalOffsetType`属性值设置为。This property determines the interval offset type of an axis, and is used for the interval offset type of an axis' labels, and major tick marks or grid lines if the axis element's own `IntervalOffsetType` property value is set to . 此属性设置为将导致的值正在使用 (只有轴元素，例如，主要网格线等可以设置为)。Setting this property to will result in a value of being used (only the axis elements such as major grid lines, etc. can be set to ). > [!NOTE] > 次要网格线和轴的刻度线永远不会将此属性用于其间隔偏移量类型。The minor grid lines and tick marks of an axis never use this property for their interval offset type. 轴的间隔由属性。The interval of the axis is determined by the property.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::DateTimeIntervalType IntervalType { System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::DateTimeIntervalType get(); void set(System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::DateTimeIntervalType value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置轴的间隔类型。

span.span: Gets or sets the interval type of an axis.

value.span: ，表示轴的间隔类型。

span.span: A that represents the interval type of an axis.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性确定轴的间隔类型，如果针对的轴标签、 主要刻度线或主要网格线的间隔类型使用轴元素自身的`IntervalType`属性值设置为。This property determines the interval type of an axis, and is used for the interval type of an axis' labels, major tick marks, or major grid lines if the axis element's own `IntervalType` property value is set to . 此属性设置为将导致的值正在使用。Setting this property to will result in a value of being used. 只有轴元素，如网格线可以将设置为。Only the axis elements, such as grid lines, can be set to . **请注意**次要网格线和轴的刻度线永远不会为其间隔类型使用此属性。**Note** The minor grid lines and tick marks of an axis never use this property for their interval type. 轴的间隔由属性。The interval of the axis is determined by the property. > [!IMPORTANT] > 如果轴间隔类型表示的时间如小时、 分钟和等，然后按顺序对缩放才能正常工作，必须设置为时间值。If the axis interval type is represented by a time such as hours, minutes, and so forth, then in order for zooming to function correctly, the must be set to a time value as well. 例如，如果 ChartArea1.AxisX.IntervalType 设置为小时，然后 ChartArea1.CursorX.IntervalType 将设置为分钟。For example, if ChartArea1.AxisX.IntervalType is set to hours, then ChartArea1.CursorX.IntervalType could be set to minutes.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool IsReversed { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置指示是否将轴反转的标志。

span.span: Gets or sets a flag which indicates whether the axis is reversed.

value.span: 如果反转轴，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the axis is reversed; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果设置为反向，轴上的值反向的排序顺序，并且翻转方向的轴上的值。If set to reversed, the values on the axis are in reversed sort order and the direction of values on the axis is flipped.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool IsStartedFromZero { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个标志，该标志指示在所有数据点值均为正值时是否将轴的最小值自动设置为零。

summary.span: 如果存在负数据点值，则将使用数据点的最小值。

span.span: If there are negative data point values, the minimum value of the data points will be used.

value.span: 如果在所有数据点值均为正值时将轴的最小值自动设置为零，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the minimum value of the axis is automatically set to zero when all data point values are positive; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 字体大小不能小于 5。The font size cannot be less than 5.

span.span: Gets or sets the minimum font size that can be used by the label auto-fitting algorithm.

value.span: 一个 值。

span.span: An value.

Attribute.AttributeName: System.ComponentModel.Editor("System.Windows.Forms.Design.DataVisualization.Charting.FlagsEnumUITypeEditor, System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Design, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=31bf3856ad364e35", "System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor, System.Drawing, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a")

summary.span: 获取或设置允许的标签更改，这些更改可用于使标签能够沿轴进行调整。

span.span: Gets or sets the allowable label changes that can be made to enable the label to be fit along an axis.

value.span: 一个 枚举值。

span.span: A enumeration value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性必须设置为`true`。The property must be set to `true`.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::LabelStyle ^ LabelStyle { System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::LabelStyle ^ get(); void set(System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::LabelStyle ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置轴的 属性。

span.span: Gets or sets the properties of an axis.

value.span: 一个 对象，该对象用于定义轴标签样式。

span.span: A object, which defines the axis label style.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此属性指定的样式和格式，和等等的轴标签。Use this property to specify the style, formatting, and so forth, of axis labels. 如果属性是`true`，自动确定的字体大小、 字体角度以及偏移标签的使用。If the property is `true`, the font size, font angle and the use of offset labels are determined automatically. 如果设置了 LabelStyle.Font.Size，任何一个或属性，属性将设置为`false`。If you set any one of the LabelStyle.Font.Size, or properties, the property will be set to `false`. 请注意，如果没有时间用于标签，包含日期的格式和所使用的数据点值指定的时间，则时间将影响的各数据点的位置，即使它们不显示标签格式导致。Note that if a format that consists of a date without a time is used for labels, and the data point values that are used specify times, the times will affect the positions of the data points, even though they are not displayed due to the label formatting.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Drawing::Color LineColor { System::Drawing::Color get(); void set(System::Drawing::Color value); };

Attribute.AttributeName: System.ComponentModel.Editor("System.Windows.Forms.Design.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartColorEditor, System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Design, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=31bf3856ad364e35", "System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor, System.Drawing, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a")

summary.span: 获取或设置轴的线条颜色。

span.span: Gets or sets the line color of an axis.

value.span: 一个 对象，该对象表示用于绘制轴的线条颜色。

span.span: A object that represents the line color used to draw the axis.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性指定轴的线条颜色。Use the property to specify the line color of an axis. **请注意**如果未启用轴但相邻轴使用网格线，这些网格线之一将显示未启用轴代替。**Note** If an axis is not enabled but an adjacent axis is using grid lines, one of those grid lines will be displayed in place of the axis that is not enabled. 如果，则会发生同样的情况下的轴的属性设置为。The same situation will occur if the property of an axis is set to . 在这种情况下，轴不用于绘制数据，并将改为绘制相邻轴的网格行。In this case, the axis is not being used to plot data, and the grid line of an adjacent axis will be drawn instead.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::ChartDashStyle LineDashStyle { System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::ChartDashStyle get(); void set(System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::ChartDashStyle value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置轴的线型。

span.span: Gets or sets the line style of an axis.

value.span: 一个 枚举值。

span.span: A enumeration value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性确定用于轴的线条样式。The property determines the line style used for an axis. 行可以是实体、 线和等。The line can be solid, dotted, and so forth. **请注意**如果未启用轴但相邻轴使用网格线，这些网格线之一将显示未启用轴代替。**Note** If an axis is not enabled but an adjacent axis is using grid lines, one of those grid lines will be displayed in place of the axis that is not enabled. 如果，则会发生同样的情况下的轴的属性设置为。The same situation will occur if the property of an axis is set to . 在这种情况下，轴不用于绘制数据，并将改为绘制相邻轴的网格行。In this case, the axis is not being used to plot data, and the grid line of an adjacent axis will be drawn instead.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int LineWidth { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置轴的线条宽度（以像素为单位）。

span.span: Gets or sets the line width of an axis, in pixels.

value.span: 一个 值，该值表示轴线的宽度。

span.span: An value that represents the width of an axis line.

value.span: 默认值为一个 (1) 像素。

span.span: The default value is one (1) pixel.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性获取或设置轴行的宽度 （像素）。The property gets or sets the width of an axis line, in pixels. 如果宽度设置为零 (0)，将不会显示行。If the width is set to zero (0), the line will not be displayed. **请注意**如果未启用轴但相邻轴使用网格线，这些网格线之一将显示未启用轴代替。**Note** If an axis is not enabled but an adjacent axis is using grid lines, one of those grid lines will be displayed in place of the axis that is not enabled. 如果，则会发生同样的情况下的轴的属性设置为。The same situation will occur if the property of an axis is set to . 在这种情况下，轴不用于绘制数据，并将改为绘制相邻轴的网格行。In this case, the axis is not being used to plot data, and the grid line of an adjacent axis will be drawn instead.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property double LogarithmBase { double get(); void set(double value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置用于对数轴的对数底的值。

span.span: Gets or sets a value for the logarithm base for the logarithmic axis.

value.span: 一个 值。

span.span: A value.

value.span: 默认值为以 10 为底。

span.span: The default value is base 10.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性才会起作用时属性设置为`true`。This property only has an effect when the property is set to `true`. 请注意，此属性仅适用于值轴，用于绘制数据。Note that this property is only applicable to value axes, which are used to plot data. 设置此属性对于类别轴将导致引发异常。Setting this property for a categorical axis will result in an exception being thrown.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::Grid ^ MajorGrid { System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::Grid ^ get(); void set(System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::Grid ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置用于设置轴的主要网格线属性的 对象。

span.span: Gets or sets a object used to set the major grid line properties for an axis.

value.span: 一个 对象，该对象用于获取或设置轴的主要网格线属性。

span.span: A object used to get or set the major grid properties of an axis.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 始终结合的数据点绘制主要网格线。Major grid lines are always drawn in conjunction with a data point. 也就是说，它们将出现在轴上的数据点，类别轴刻度线与相同的点。That is, they will occur at the same point along an axis as a data point, for categorical axis tick marks. 对于数值轴，默认情况下的主要网格线绘制在标签出现的位置。For value axes, major grid lines by default are drawn wherever labels occur. 此属性可用于更改主要网格线频率、 颜色和等。You can use this property to change major grid line frequency, color, and so forth.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::TickMark ^ MajorTickMark { System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::TickMark ^ get(); void set(System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::TickMark ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置用于设置轴的主要刻度线属性的 对象。

span.span: Gets or sets a object used to set the major tick mark properties of an axis.

value.span: 一个 对象，该对象用于设置轴的主要刻度线的属性。

span.span: A object used to set the properties of a major tick mark of an axis.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 主要刻度线始终以与数据点一起绘制。Major tick marks are always drawn in conjunction with a data point. 类别轴刻度线将出现在轴上的数据点与相同的点。Categorical axis tick marks will occur at the same point along an axis as a data point. 对于数值轴，主要刻度线绘制默认情况下在标签出现的位置。For value axes, major tick marks are drawn by default wherever labels occur. 此属性可用于更改主要刻度线标记属性，例如频率、 颜色或大小。You can use this property to change the major tick mark properties such as frequency, color, or size.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property double Maximum { double get(); void set(double value); };

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum value of an axis.

span.span: A value that represents the maximum value of an axis.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 要自动舍入最大和最小轴值，请调用方法。To automatically round the maximum and minimum axis values call the method. 值必须大于值。The value must be greater than the value.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property float MaximumAutoSize { float get(); void set(float value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置轴的最大大小（以图表区域的百分比形式表示）。

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum size of the axis, measured as a percentage of the chart area.

summary.span: 此值由自动布局算法使用。

span.span: This value is used by the automatic layout algorithm.

value.span: A值，该值表示该轴的最大大小。

span.span: A value that represents the maximum size of the axis.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property double Minimum { double get(); void set(double value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置轴的最小值。

span.span: Gets or sets the minimum value of an axis.

value.span: 一个 值，该值表示轴的最小值。

span.span: A value that represents the minimum value of an axis.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 请注意，是否显式设置此值，数据元素的 X 值必须考虑到帐户。Note that if you set this value explicitly, the X-values of data elements must be taken into account. 如果所有数据点都的 X 值均为零，控件将假定在零处发生的第一个数据点。If all data points have X-values of zero, the control will assume the first data point occurs at zero. 此外，如果显式设置值，属性将被忽略。Also, if the value is explicitly set, the property will be ignored. 值必须小于值。The value must be less than the value. 要自动舍入的最大和最小轴值。To automatically round the maximum and minimum axis values. 调用方法。call the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 主要网格线之间绘制次要网格线。Minor grid lines are drawn in between the major grid lines. 此属性用于更改次要网格线，例如频率、 颜色和等的属性。Use this property to change the attributes of a minor grid line, such as frequency, color, and so forth.

span.span: A object used for the minor tick mark properties of an axis.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 应主要刻度线，通常发生标签之间绘制次要刻度线。Minor tick marks should be drawn between major tick marks, where labels usually occur. 此属性用于更改次要刻度线标记频率、 颜色和等。Use this property to change the minor tick mark frequency, color, and so forth.

summary.span: 自动舍入轴值。

span.span: Automatically rounds axis values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用方法的轴的值进行四舍五入。Call the method to round the values of an axis. 请注意，当调用此方法将不会更改使用轴的间隔。Note that the interval used for the axis will not be changed when this method is called. 此方法仅支持有关 X 和 X2 轴。This method is only supported for the X and X2 axes. 默认情况下，Y 和 Y2 轴值会舍入。The Y and Y2 axes values are rounded by default.

summary.span: 获取或设置轴标题的对齐方式。

span.span: Gets or sets the alignment of an axis title.

value.span: 一个 枚举值。

span.span: A enumeration value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可能的对齐方式的值为， ，和。Possible alignment values are , , and . 值为相当于向顶部或向右，具体取决于的方向的轴或条带线的对齐方式。A value of equates to an alignment to the top or the right, depending on the orientation of the axis or strip line. 相同的方式的值中相当于向底部或向右对齐方式。In the same manner, a value of equates to an alignment to the bottom or the right. 如果你想更好地控制轴标题的位置，则必须执行自定义绘图使用或事件。If you want more control over the positioning of an axis title, you must perform custom drawing using the or event. 你可以进一步对齐和定位的标题对象通过其和 TitleAngle 属性。You can further align and position the titles of objects by using their and TitleAngle properties.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 获取或设置标题字体属性，如表面或大小。Gets or sets title font properties such as face or size. 若要设置字体属性在运行的时、 新必须创建对象。To set font properties at run time, a new object must be created. 若要更改的当前属性的任何尝试对象在运行时将导致编译错误。Any attempt to change the properties of the current object at run time will result in a compilation error.
